Maris Associates Private Limited

DELIVERING INNOVATION

1978

AVM Polybags was founded on to produce Poly Laminated Jute Bag.

1987

MARIS was founded to produce PP, HDPE Laminated Sacks Paper Sandwich Bag.

1990

Our Startup capacity was 1500 MT/Annum.

1993

1st high capacity tape plant -5.5T/day.

2003

ISO QMS standards.

2005

Our Capacity was 5600 MT/Annum .

2008

Accorded the status of ‘Star Export House’ by the Indian Government.

2012

Installation of high tenacity yarn plant with capacity of 1000 MT per annum .

2014

Our capacity has increased to 9200 MT per annum.

2015

Became the first Indian FIBC manufacturer to be accredited with SA 8000.

2019

Member of SEDEX.

Today

Today MARIS is a leading player in India for FIBCs with exports all over the world .
